population Module¶

Class to represent poulations data.

class population.Population(N, T)[source]¶

A generic class that represents populations data.

Parameters:
  • N (int) – Population size.
  • T (int) – Patch size.

Attributes

Name Value
Integer  
Population.N Population size (int).
Population.T Aggregation patch size (int).
Population.Npatch Number of patches (int).
Individuals data  
Population.phenotype Individual phenotype (N np.array bool).
Population.genotype Individual genotype (N np.array bool).
Population.repartition Individual “is in a group ?” (N np.array bool).
Population.genealogy Index of individual parent (N np.array int).
Patch data  
Population.proportions Group comp proportions (N/T*4 np.array float).
Population.payoff Payoffs by patch (N/T*4 np.array float).

Note

Nb. Population.genealogy[i] is the index of the individual i parent in the individuals arrays of precedent generation. If the individual survived for more than one generation, it’s -1.
